title: Housekeeping Attendant
description: Cleans guest rooms and public areas

title: Chef de Partie
description: Prepares meals and supervises kitchen staff

title: Security Guard
description: Ensures safety of guests and property

title: Concierge Assistant
description: Provides guest services and local guidance

title: Pool Waiter
description: Serves food and drinks at poolside

title: Bellhop
description: Assists guests with luggage and transport

title: Sous Chef
description: Supports head chef in kitchen operations

title: Night Auditor
description: Manages overnight front desk and reports

title: Banquet Server
description: Serves food at banquets and events

title: Bartender
description: Mixes and serves drinks at bar

title: Kitchen Helper
description: Assists chefs with prep and cleaning
